solution_line_template: The first {num_shirts_first_group} shirts cost {cost_per_shirt_first_group}*{num_shirts_first_group}=<<{cost_per_shirt_first_group}*{num_shirts_first_group}={cost_first_group}>>{cost_first_group} dollars in total.

The remaining {remaining_shirts_count} shirts cost {total_cost_all_shirts}-{cost_first_group}=<<{total_cost_all_shirts}-{cost_first_group}={cost_remaining_shirts}>>{cost_remaining_shirts} dollars in total.
One of the remaining shirts costs {cost_remaining_shirts}/{remaining_shirts_count}=<<{cost_remaining_shirts}/{remaining_shirts_count}={cost_one_remaining_shirt}>>{cost_one_remaining_shirt} dollars.
